bill.summary: 2/8/1994--Introduced. Authorizes the Secretary of Transportation to convey without consideration to any nonprofit organization operating a former hospital ship all U.S. right, title, and interest in a vessel of at least 40,000 displacement tons in the National Defense Reserve Fleet which is scheduled for scrapping. Requires such organization to sell the vessel for scrap and use the proceeds to refurbish and maintain the former hospital ship to engage in public health activities.
